post.description:
After Beacon node receives this request, search using discv5 for peers related to this subnet and replace current peers with those ones if necessary If validator is_aggregator, beacon node must:
- announce subnet topic subscription on gossipsub
- aggregate attestations received on that subnet

200.description: Slot signature is valid and beacon node has prepared the attestation subnet. Note that, there is no guarantee the node will find peers for the subnet

503.description: Beacon node is currently syncing and not serving requests.

400.description: The request could not be processed, check the response for more information.
